title: Peep 2.3.2 – File viewer and text encoding conversion utility
content: Peep is a file-viewing and text-encoding utility which is useful when programming, when experiencing text encoding problems, or when you need to extract information from a file that you can’t open otherwise. Its data-extraction functionality allows you to view files in a ‘hexeditor’ style; it’s not intended to be an editor, but rather to inspect, […]

title: Stellar Phoenix Entourage Repair 2.0.0.0 – Repair and restore MS Entourage database files
content: Stellar Phoenix Entourage Repair is a smart and user-friendly Entourage database repair solution. Its interactive interface allows you to scan and repair corrupt Entourage databases files along with preview of the scanned database items (i.e. emails, notes, address book, scheduled tasks, and personalized calendar) prior to recovery. title: iRamDisk 3.6.12 – Create a RAM disk

title: New Paint X 1.2.1 – A classic painting application
content: New Paint X is a classic painting application to draw, color, or edit pictures. title: oXygen XML Editor 20.1 – Java XML editor
content: Oxygen is an XML Editor, XSLT/XQuery debugger and profiler with full Unicode support. It supports visual XML editing driven by CSS stylesheets.
